–Ω–∞–ø–∏—à–∏ —Ç–µ—Å—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è  def left(i):     return 2*i+1  def right(i):     return 2*i+2  def parent(i):     return (i-1)//2  def heapify_up(arr, i):     while i > 0 and arr[i] > arr[parent(i)]:         arr[i], arr[parent(i)] = arr[parent(i)], arr[i]         i = parent(i)  def heapify_down(arr, i):     while True:         l = left(i)         r = right(i)         max_ind = i         if l < len(arr) and arr[l] > arr[max_ind]:             max_ind = l         if r < len(arr) and arr[r] > arr[max_ind]:             max_ind = r         if max_ind != i:             arr[i], arr[max_ind] = arr[max_ind], arr[i]             i = max_ind         else:             break  def Insert(arr, k):     arr.append(k)     heapify_up(arr, len(arr)-1)  def Extract(arr):     max_val = arr[0]     arr[0] = arr[-1]     arr.pop()     heapify_down(arr, 0)     return max_val  n = int(input()) arr = [] for i in range(n):     op = input().split()     if op[0] == '0':         Insert(arr, int(op[1]))     else:         print(Extract(arr))
